publ: by American Printing House for the Blind
name: OandMTrivia
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: o. m. trivia
des:
O and M Trivia is a fun way to learn and reinforce orientation and mobility knowledge for people of all ages! Cardinal directions, cane techniques, and landmarks are just a few of the topics covered within the game. Users can play alone or with up to three additional players. Scores are calculated automatically for friendly competition. Game settings also allow users to select appropriate difficulty levels.

Utilizing virtual assistant platforms to deliver content allows for access in the home, the classroom, or on the go!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
